duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing different assembly and packaging jobs in the processing of foods
Unpacking raw materials, mixing ingredients, assembling product, and packaging finished goods
Counting, packing, and inspecting finished product for correct label, cleanliness, and quality
Ensuring that all products meet company and government quality standards
Inspecting products, throwing out or fixing products as necessary, and notifying supervisor of quality issues, ingredient/material problems, and equipment breakdowns
Performing all duties in compliance with existing USDA, OSHA, State, Federal, and company regulations, policies, and procedures
